self_contained_context.background: After successful installation, the system needs to verify that all expected files are present. This provides confidence that the build completed successfully.
prerequisites: 01-01: Error Codes Module must be complete
self_contained_context.technical_context: Create installation_verifier.py with verification logic. Check: agent file counts in ~/.claude/agents/, command file counts in ~/.claude/commands/, manifest existence at ~/.claude/nwave-manifest.yaml, essential command files (commit.md, review.md, develop.md). Return VerificationResult with success/failure, counts, and missing files.

task_specification.name: Installation Verifier
task_specification.description: Create installation_verifier.py with verification logic. Check agent file counts, command file counts, manifest existence, essential commands.
task_specification.motivation: Post-installation verification catches incomplete builds before users attempt to use the installer, preventing confusing runtime errors.
task_specification.detailed_instructions: 1. Create scripts/install/installation_verifier.py with VerificationResult dataclass. 2. Implement verify_agent_files() counting files in ~/.claude/agents/. 3. Implement verify_command_files() counting files in ~/.claude/commands/. 4. Implement verify_manifest() checking manifest existence. 5. Implement verify_essential_commands() checking critical files. 6. Create tests/unit/test_installation_verifier.py.
task_specification.acceptance_criteria: Verification runs after successful build; Verification reports agent file count; Verification reports command file count; Verification reports manifest existence; Verification detects missing essential files

mapped_scenario.notes: First of 5 scenarios for installation verifier
